0000101101001011 1000000001101001 0 -> sum: 1000101110110100, cout: 0
1010011111100001 1110000000010101 0 -> sum: 1000011111110110, cout: 1
0111000101111001 1000010101010110 1 -> sum: 1111011011010000, cout: 0
1011111001001011 0111010111000101 1 -> sum: 0011010000010001, cout: 1
0110111100011100 1001000100101010 0 -> sum: 0000000001000110, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
